text: so I meant Roberto when I was traveling
in Italy after graduating from

was in Sicily and in the town of toda
minha which is weird Roberto owns a
clothing store in a wine bar she came in
actually at the store so at that point I

keep talking in English and and then she
asked me to if she could try a pair of
shoes and she said in Italian he said
terrain todo as high as 38 and I

allston Italian and then I understood

speak numbers and words and food words
and that's it after dinner I was walking

maybe just go up and talk to him and my

yes is this minus if you want you can

I'm living to go back to United States

it was very happy about it there was

something here its last a year and a

lightly us on a fairy tale it's
something real that doesn't happen to
every once we should try and accept that

that was four years ago now she's not
